with the editor changes... i meant like changing most of the graphics and 
perhaps creating a general theme around the game, based upon other 
happenings, or characters and such.  For example, I decided to change all the 
characters into characters from zelda, because it's a classic.  So i changed 
the soldier to look like Link, the fairy to look like a fairy :), the golem 
to look like ganon, etc.  It was a lot of fun, esp. after i was finished 
editing the whole thing.  I don't know if the ppl at FSGames care if I do 
this or not (i hope not), but i just wanted to make the game a little more 
interesting... like Red Link killing Green Link, whose then in turn killed by 
Blue Ganon, who then gets frozen in retaliation by Red Fairy... it's really 
fun.

Tristan
